input.sentences: the students asked questions to the teachers
the mic was passed around so the teacher can give some clarity
the professor was patient and took his time
and made sure all the students understood the process
and each took the class seriously and passed
output.sentences: The students passed the mic around to ask the teachers questions.
As the teacher answered they passed the mic to the next one.
The professor was very patient and took his time in teaching the students.
He wanted to make sure his students understood the process.
The students all passed the class.
